Package swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller

Interface Summary
CameraCallback  
 

Class Summary
Arduino This method is about the control of our arduino controller.
Cam The Cam Class is used to set the settings, initialized the cam, the socket and the preview.
CameraSurface  
Connection Provides an API for handling and changing connection data.
Controller_Android Wraps all other classes into this class to be used by the activity.
GPS Provides an API for handling GPS data.
Network This class is used to start the connection with the pc-programm.
Record_Sound The method starts and stops recording the Sound.
Socket_Controller This class is used for receiving data from the pc to control the application
Socket_Package This class is used to send information to the PC
Sound Wraps all other classes into this class to be used by the activity.
